CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Venue__c) ), Venue__r.Name & BR() & Venue__r.Street_Address__c & BR() & Venue__r.Town__c & BR() & Venue__r.Postcode__c & BR() & BR(),,
Parent_Host__r.FirstName + ' ' + Parent_Host__r.LastName + "'s home" & BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingStreet & BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingCity & BR() & Parent_Host__r.MailingPostalCode& BR() & BR() )
CustomField.label: Venue Address
